items.title: X’s declining Android app installs are hurting subscription revenue
items.description: X is struggling on Android with installs down by 49% year-over-year as of June 2025.

items.title: Texas attorney general accuses Meta, Character.AI of misleading kids with mental health claims
items.description: Texas attorney general Ken Paxton is investigating Meta and CharacterAI over claims they deceptively market chatbots as mental health tools, raising c...

items.title: Hank Green’s Focus Friend app is climbing the App Store charts — and it’s extremely cute
items.description: If you fail to stay focused, you will make an anthropomorphic bean very sad, because its knitting project depends on your ability to stay on task.

items.title: Substack writers can now direct US readers to (often cheaper) web-based subscriptions on iOS
items.description: Substack's iOS app rolls out support for web-based payments, which can save subscribers money.

items.title: Pixel 10, AI capabilities, and everything else we expect out of the Made by Google 2025 event
items.description: Dive into what we can expect from the Made by Google 2025 event, where the tech giant will debut its Pixel 10 lineup.
